org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint

类 ZooKeeperCompletedCheckpointStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint.ZooKeeperCompletedCheckpointStore
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CompletedCheckpointStore

    public class ZooKeeperCompletedCheckpointStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompletedCheckpointStore
    CompletedCheckpointStore for JobManagers running in HighAvailabilityMode.ZOOKEEPER.

    Checkpoints are added under a ZNode per job: 

     +----O /flink/checkpoints/<job-id>  [persistent]
 .    |
 .    +----O /flink/checkpoints/<job-id>/1 [persistent]
 .    .                                  .
 .    .                                  .
 .    .                                  .
 .    +----O /flink/checkpoints/<job-id>/N [persistent]

    During recovery, the latest checkpoint is read from ZooKeeper. If there is more than one, only the latest one is used and older ones are discarded (even if the maximum number of retained checkpoints is greater than one).

    If there is a network partition and multiple JobManagers run concurrent checkpoints for the same program, it is OK to take any valid successful checkpoint as long as the "history" of checkpoints is consistent. Currently, after recovery we start out with only a single checkpoint to circumvent those situations.

    • 字段详细资料

      • LOG

        private static final org.slf4j.Logger LOG

      • client

        private final org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFramework client
        Curator ZooKeeper client.

      • checkpointsInZooKeeper

        private final ZooKeeperStateHandleStore<CompletedCheckpoint> checkpointsInZooKeeper
        Completed checkpoints in ZooKeeper.

      • maxNumberOfCheckpointsToRetain

        private final int maxNumberOfCheckpointsToRetain
        The maximum number of checkpoints to retain (at least 1).

      • completedCheckpoints

        private final java.util.ArrayDeque<CompletedCheckpoint> completedCheckpoints
        Local copy of the completed checkpoints in ZooKeeper. This is restored from ZooKeeper when recovering and is maintained in parallel to the state in ZooKeeper during normal operations.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ZooKeeperCompletedCheckpointStore

        public ZooKeeperCompletedCheckpointStore(int maxNumberOfCheckpointsToRetain,
                                         org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFramework client,
                                         java.lang.String checkpointsPath,
                                         RetrievableStateStorageHelper<CompletedCheckpoint> stateStorage,
                                         java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a ZooKeeperCompletedCheckpointStore instance.
        参数:
        maxNumberOfCheckpointsToRetain - The maximum number of checkpoints to retain (at least 1). Adding more checkpoints than this results in older checkpoints being discarded. On recovery, we will only start with a single checkpoint.
        client - The Curator ZooKeeper client
        checkpointsPath - The ZooKeeper path for the checkpoints (needs to start with a '/')
        stateStorage - State storage to be used to persist the completed checkpoint
        executor - to give to the ZooKeeperStateHandleStore to run ZooKeeper callbacks
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

    • 方法详细资料

      • requiresExternalizedCheckpoints

        public boolean requiresExternalizedCheckpoints()
        从接口复制的说明: CompletedCheckpointStore
        This method returns whether the completed checkpoint store requires checkpoints to be externalized. Externalized checkpoints have their meta data persisted, which the checkpoint store can exploit (for example by simply pointing the persisted metadata).
        指定者:
        requiresExternalizedCheckpoints 在接口中 CompletedCheckpointStore
        返回:
        True, if the store requires that checkpoints are externalized before being added, false if the store stores the metadata itself.

      • recover

        public void recover()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the latest checkpoint from ZooKeeper and removes all others.

        Important: Even if there are more than one checkpoint in ZooKeeper, this will only recover the latest and discard the others. Otherwise, there is no guarantee that the history of checkpoints is consistent.

        指定者:
        recover 在接口中 CompletedCheckpointStore
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • addCheckpoint

        public void addCheckpoint(CompletedCheckpoint checkpoint)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Synchronously writes the new checkpoints to ZooKeeper and asynchronously removes older ones.
        指定者:
        addCheckpoint 在接口中 CompletedCheckpointStore
        参数:
        checkpoint - Completed checkpoint to add.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

        public void shutdown(JobStatus jobStatus)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: CompletedCheckpointStore
        Shuts down the store.

        The job status is forwarded and used to decide whether state should actually be discarded or kept.

        指定者:
